Service Details: - Deploys volunteers to specific disaster/emergency areas and reports to EMBC in local communities or the Ministry of Agriculture as required- Volunteers prepare for, rescue and shelter domestic animals in a disaster - Volunteers required year-round, during disaster times and non-disaster times
Eligibility: Ages: 18 year(s) and upAll volunteers are required to take an Intro to Emergency Pet Services Course. The course fee includes the uniform and your first year's membership dues.
How to Apply: Please visit our website or email for our next next training date
Cost: $35.00 for the IEPS course * Membership is $20 per year
Meetings: Please visit our website for scheduled meetings
Address & Map: 1048 Richter StKelowna, BC     V1Y 2K5View MapQuest Map
